name: Viking Rush: Clan Defenders' Glory Clash Chronicle
summary:
Never walk away from home ahead of your axe and sword. You can't feel a battle in your bones or foresee a fight. - The Havamal
The legendary Nordic clan of Zuer islands has come under attack from the army of giants and dragons, who have surrounded the entire island. The Viking army has already left for the battlefield, except our lead warriors who got late and now are in a rush to join other troops.
